channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm episodes #85 & #86, Garrett Dimon
channel.description:
Listen to our conversation with Garrett Dimon of Wildbit, formely of Sifter.
[Download part 1.](http://bootstrapped.fm/85-garrett-dimon-part-1-founder-of-sifter-currently-at-wildbit/) [Download part 2.](http://bootstrapped.fm/86-garrett-dimon-part-2-founder-of-sifter-currently-at-wildbit/)
* [Garrett's Website](https://garrettdimon.com/) * [Sifter](https://sifterapp.com/) * [Wildbit](http://wildbit.com/) * [Starting & Sustaining](https://get.startingandsustaining.com/)
